Bash(git commit -m "Fix NSNull handling in setCCPAPrivacyString

When Dart passes null to setCCPAPrivacyString, it becomes NSNull in Objective-C.
CloudXCore''s setCCPAPrivacyString expects nil (not NSNull) to clear the value.

Root cause: NSNull is a singleton object, not nil. The check ''if (ccpaPrivacyString)''
passes for NSNull, then NSUserDefaults crashes trying to save a non-plist object.

Fix: Use nilIfNull helper to convert NSNull â†’ nil before passing to CloudXCore.

Crash message:
''Attempt to insert non-property list object null for key CLXPrivacyCCPAPrivacy''
